page.title: 04HOUSING
page.content: There are many different kinds of houses in our area. A lot of them have been built fairly recently. There are only about five old houses in the village. The modern houses are nearly all kit houses. People buy a plot of land and then build the type of house they want on it. There are four houses being built at the moment. The majority of houses are owner occupied. There are some very large old houses in the area. One of these (Bunchrew House) is split into flats and rented out to people. There is also a residential caravan site in Bunchrew.
